item.title: Lightweight CARTO Alternative
item.description: Light alternative to CARTO Dekart is light and fast map analytics for BigQuery and Snowflake. Your data team will create up-to-date maps in seconds with SQL without moving data. Start Free Book a call Watch short demo video Why Choose Dekart Over CARTO? Transparent Pricing Free Personal Plan. Grow plans start at $49/month â€“ no surprises, no overpaying. ðŸ‘‰ Dekart Cloud pricing No Vendor Lock-In Open-source license, commercial code license, SaaS, or self-hosting â€“ Dekart meets any deployment needs.

item.title: Self-Hosted Pricing
item.description: Your Data. Your Rules. CloudSelf-Hosted You host it. Run Dekart on your own setup. Open-Source Free on GitHub Do it yourself Run with Docker Connect BigQuery & Snowflake Share maps   Premium $5,880/year Enterprise Security Google SSO Fine-graned access controls Premium codebase Slack support White Label $58,800/year For scalability, and integration High availability Custom integrations Your branding and SSO 250 hours custom dev included Compare Features Features Open Source View on GitHub Premium Get trial White Label Contact us Core Features Single Docker deployment Create maps with SQL Query BigQuery, Snowflake, Wherobots, or Postgres directly and turn results into live maps.
